channel.title: Sandra Oh on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Sandra Oh on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: ‘Good Fortune’ Review: Keanu Reeves Plays an Inept Guardian Angel in Aziz Ansari’s Alternately Fun and Clunky Satire
item.description: Also starring Seth Rogen, Keke Palmer and Sandra Oh, Ansari’s feature directorial debut revolves around a gig worker and a venture capitalist who swap lives.

item.title: ‘Good Fortune’ Review: Keanu Reeves Plays an Inept Guardian Angel in Aziz Ansari’s Alternately Fun and Clunky Satire
item.description: Also starring Seth Rogen, Keke Palmer and Sandra Oh, Ansari’s feature directorial debut revolves around a gig worker and a venture capitalist who swap lives.

item.title: ‘Smurfs’ Review: Rihanna and James Corden Lead All-Star Voice Cast in a Reboot That Chooses Chaos Over Charm
item.description: Nick Offerman, Natasha Lyonne, Sandra Oh, John Goodman, Kurt Russell and Jimmy Kimmel also lend their vocal talent to this new installment of the animated franchise.
